abilities.Adaptablity: Boosts the power of the Pokémon's moves that match its type.
abilities.Blaze: Boosts the power of Fire-type moves when HP is low.
abilities.Damp: Prevents any explosions on the dungeon floor.
abilities.Guts: Boosts Attack if the Pokémon has any status problems.
abilities.No Guard: Allows Pokémon to ignore stat modifications to accuracy and evasion.
abilities.Overgrow: Boosts the power of Grass-type moves when HP is low.
abilities.Pick Up: Finds items if the Pokémon is not holding anything.
abilities.Rock Head: Prevents damage from the recoil of moves such as Take Down.
abilities.Run Away: Becomes terrified and flees when HP gets low. Leaders will resist this urge.
abilities.Torrent: Boosts the power of Water-type moves when HP is low.
